ModMetaData.name: DMC Abilities - Devil May Cry Inspired Melee Skills
ModMetaData.author: YourName
ModMetaData.description:
Adds two Devil May Cry-inspired melee abilities to RimWorld:
• Stinger - A fast dash attack that teleports you to an enemy and strikes instantly • Judgement Cut - A ranged slash attack that creates area-of-effect damage
Both abilities work with any modded melee weapons and are learned through consumable skillbooks found in trader inventories.
Features: - Full compatibility with modded melee weapons - Weapon-based damage scaling with sword bonuses - Visual effects using existing RimWorld motes - Memory-safe implementation that can be safely removed mid-save - Configurable trader stock chances
Requirements: None (uses base game mechanics only)
